content.detailedDescription:
I just glanced out the window to look at the stars as i normally do and these 2 white disks flew by at a pretty high speed.

i thought maybe it was geese far up until i realized they had no flapping movement, were in circular formations, and moved much faster then even the planes landing at the airport which fly in from the south, over my apartment.

those are going 200-300kmh so these white disks were much faster. i guessed their height to only be about 1000m, but hard to tell if they were massive and far up, or smaller and closer to the ground.

they were completely silent. whenever jets fly over, the foundation of my apartment shakes, especially during the annual air show and windows are always open.

once out of the horizon i couldn���t see them anymore.

the whole experience lasted about 10 seconds so i had no chance to grab the minidv or binoculars. i was also pretty shocked and confused.

roughly 10 minutes later i could hear the sound of jets in the air but i couldn���t see anything. perhaps just a plane leaving the airport but i am in a smaller city of 200,000.  the airport normally doesn't have flights that late.
i'm about 50 kms from dundurn a military base.

i���ve always been skeptical so i have no idea what it is i saw.

what was rather strange about them, is the almost transparent 'skin'.  like a jelly fish.

*below is a photoshop composition i made. i didn't get the scale correct, they were much further up in the sky.*
content.summary: Looked out the window, 2 massive white disks flew over

content.detailedDescription:
had waited for new years eve to sound off- fire works gun shot ect. headed off to work was traveling north bound on new ballwin rd- when noticed bright yellowish orange strobing star in the sky- rapidly qued in on color and slow movement of the "star" eastward, as my driving position changed i noticed a triangular arrrangement of 3 lights and its uniform motion eastward bound- i was looking to identify the position of these lights as an object. i looked at the radio clock for a time.
a giant triangle but really could not verify that. then i found another yellowish orange light to the west in the same line as the base line of the triangle.Following slightly behind the traingular formation. i got my cell phone out and tried to snap some pics. i was concerned about burning out the image- with the cars interior lights so i manuvered the car and turned   off the lights- had traffic and by the time i was ready the object were gone. 

tooo short  i hope some one else has seen the lights- perhaps lamber airport area??

when the yellow orangelight  blendsy the become "lazor" coloered  red/orange- 
i was quite hopeful of seeing a huge triangular ship like others have reported but could not distinguish any physical connection between the moving lights

ill try to et some help to get the pic form my cell camera
content.summary: Yellow/orange lights in triangular pattern

content.detailedDescription: New years eve 2009 me and my wife went to get drinks from my mums kitchen i looked out of the window and saw an orange light in the east coming towards us over the horisen i told my wife about it and we both watched as it flew at about doble the speed of a comercail airliner such as a boeing 747. as it got closer to the house 2 more of them appererd in the sky one to the left of it and one to thr right of it they just appererd from out of nowhere at this moment we went and told my mum and her partener about them we all went outside to watch them as we were loking at them and the sky and all around us lots more of them started coming from the east some seamed to be flying in formatoin and others speradicly all over the place then i looked to the north of our position and saw a red one traveling very fast it was dark red we watched for about an hour and a half and they just kept coming when i first noteced the object i did not know what it was all i know is it was about 4 times bigger than a boeing 747 and moved a lot faster and that it was bright orange its motions where as if it was being controled as it would move for a while and then stop or change direction there was that many of them that we thought it could be first contact or an invation we lost site of them as they went behind the houses to the west or as some of them just vanised into thin air.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Balls of orange light round when still oval when moving one of them was red

content.detailedDescription: I was at home with a bunch of friends, we were all outside gettin ready for the new year looking at the full moon which also happened to be a blue moon.We all were admiring the moon and the big ring around it when a orange light popped into sight and slowly started moving north across the sky..Right when we all seen it we were all saying how bright it was and that it wasnt flying in a straight line so immedietly we all thought ufo and a friend pulled out her video camera and started recording..I'll send the footage in today when i get a copy.So we were watching/recording the 1 orange light and another 1 appeared in the skybehind it and started following the first 1 but at a distance and at that point we all were convinced these are ufo's..They clearly were not a plane or jet or missile or anything any of us had ever seen.They were completely silent and seemed amazingly high in altitude...And they did not in any way resemble a satelite...So we all just watched as they flew into the distance until we lost sight cause they flew above the clouds..I live in san jose california and it was crystal clear where they first came into view in front of the moon..I've already seen youtube footage of them and i will be posting a copy of the video there as well when i get the video from my friend today..This is a huge city and i know lotsa people had to see these things they were big and bright and very very noticeable!!!
content.summary: Orange lights flying north w/ irregular flight path.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving north on lorraine avenue (approaching 43rd street). approximate time was 9:55 (before 10:00pm when event was noticed to end). my wife was witness to this event.

a very bright redish, pulsing star like object appeared to be moving south against the night sky (clear, stary night). was traveling north in the car when noticed on my left (west) at about 20 to 25 degrees above horizon. stopped the car to make a better observation. when i stopped the object stopped moving and remainded stationary against the backdrop of other stars (this was for about 3 minutes while sitting stationary on the open road).  i rolled down the window and noticed no audible sound (e.G. there were no aircraft engine noises or otherwise in the area). i felt a bit silly about it and resumed to accelerate my car to continue my travel northward on lorraine. object immediately began to move south bound again. after which, i slowed my car to make a 2nd observation. at which point the object appeard to slow to a stop again as well. it was at this time that things started to get a little more interesting for us (about 30 seconds or so). the object slowly resumed an accelerated pace south bound again then reduced brightness after which it abruptly changed course upward at a 45 degree angle -- all within a fraction of a second and with brightness continuing to fade -- all within 5 seconds and became no longer observable. i observed the time was 10:00pm at the end of the event.  i am a 47 year old engineer and this was my first observation of any strange arial phenomena.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red pulsating object; bright as compared to stars; moved past stary background

content.detailedDescription:
A childhood friend and my self were in the back yead of my mom n dads place in calgary, we wereplaying for a bit then we layed on the hill in the back yead to watch the stars, we saw a red thing in the shy miles away for us we could se air planes comeing in to land at the air port , but this was farther than the planes we watchedfo a long time 10 to 15 min. i went in side totell my folks about it, they were haveing a plarty,and a few gursts came out to lookat it too thought it was funny and every one went back in side my friend and i watch this for a long time after . the big red light was letting little lights come out .The red one just stayed where it was in the sky n movement.While the little lights came flying out of it.... it was there long after i walked my friend home i watched it a bit longer cant recallhow long but my folks called me in caouse it ewas too late for me to be out side....From my bed room window i couldnt see the redone but i couls still see the whte ones every so often..... i think it was still the next day when the tv and radio said there were ufo sightings around alberta.. i tryed then to tell people i saw them but wea told i was just makeing it up.. there were some men i dont recall if they were army or police  they came by and asked what i saw ..My friend and i told them and they said we were just makeing it up and not to carry on or there would be trouble .. i bel;ievei was about 10 or so years old at the time . .. last year in 2009 i talked it over with stanton friedman, whi after hearing my story said that i should let more know about it as for more people who had seen this would come foreword. i hope this helps in your studys. also my auntsaw one land in her back yard  this was checked out by police and other groups,it has been years sinse and the crop still wont grow in the place. i cant say all that happed there but she could tell you the hole story and she in one who thinks that this kinda stuff is garbage but now believes too.
bryan s.
content.summary: Saw it in the sky and saw little lights comeing out of it

content.detailedDescription: At 12:15 a.M. on january 1, 2010, the family was watching the fireworks on the west side of the house minutes after the new year countdown.  we turned to watch the blue moon on the east side of the house, when suddenly, we saw six orange/red orbs flying across the sky in "v" formation. initially believing they were fireworks, we waited for them to explode, dissolve or fall. none of these happened. instead, they kept flying in a controlled "v" formation from a south to ne direction for approximately two minutes. we saw them entering into light clouds, all disappearing. we were expecting them to reappear immediately in the next cloud opening. that never happened. even my daughter, who is very skeptical, was in shock and could not deny what we all saw.
content.summary: 6 orange orbs in v shape formation - south to ne travel- joined by 7th

content.detailedDescription: I was out at midnight driving with my ex  who i despise. it was august 1995, a warm night, numerous small fast moving thunderstorms moving through the area. we decided to go driving in the country to see the lightning, i love tornadoes and storms.  we were headed east 2 miles outside of hartney, a mile over from my parents farm.  there was a storm approaching from the north east. it was moving pretty quick so i slowed down to watch it approach and there was some pretty wicked looking lightning.  i slowed the truck to a crawl as the storm went ahead of us and crossed over ahead in the sky. for some reason , i guess i was looking at the lightning, i looked up and over to the right, south, and right in front of this thunderhead there was this object in the sky.  i saw it perfectly.  the color was pewter, grey, it had a middle disc, one on top and one the same size on the bottom. i did not see any doors or windows.  but what i did see were three lights.  i must have watched it for a while because i had time to witness three lights and colors. the object was stationary and on the top portion of the craft a yellow light came on in the centre. it came on first, shone yellowish with the same intensity and went off. then on the centre of the craft in the middle underneath where the other light had come on a second yellowish light came on and went off. then on the bottom centre of the craft a beautiful purplish light came on, it increased in intensity brilliantly, and then went off. the thunderhead at this time had moved over where the craft was and it was gone. i tried to judge in my mind after how big it was and it must have been quite a size. something after i thought of was that when the lightning was flashing around it , the craft did not reflect the lightning.  the retard i was with did see it although he denies it now.  there was no hair up on the arms, no fear, no dramatics but i saw what i saw and i will never forget it. we got out of the truck and walked around and never saw another thing that night.
content.summary: Pewter gray color, three sections, three lights, non reflective , quite large, stationairy

content.detailedDescription:
Guys,

last night just after new years 12:05 am 1/1/09 my family witnessed  and video taped a v formation of 10-12 lights in jupiter florida. these lights were orange in appearance and moved from the e to nne just over the trees in our back yard, the video does show the lights and trees illuminated from the full moon. did you get any other reports from this area ? this is nothing i could identify or from the movement and size of image as normal. please call me for further help. i have not reported this yet! 2 minute video shows lights.
1.Back yard of home watching neighbor fireworks 
2. wife noticed orange and globe type pulse of lights toward east.
3.Formation of v 
4. very odd and not sure of what to think.
5. lost in trees behind clouds
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: V formation of lights  video image approx 2-minutes

content.detailedDescription:
New years night 2010 just after 12:15 am, i looked out my patio and seen three red light in a triangle formation low in the southern sky.
it appeared to drift slowly west. it first i thought it was fireworks. 
one by one the lights dimmed then were gone.
with high powered binoculars i could see the lights were still there
but not visible to the naked eye.

i'm sure many have seen this object that night.
content.summary: Triangle with 3 red light on each point

content.detailedDescription:
I live in wellingborough , northamptonshire , uk.
i looked outside the window and saw an orange sphere traveling in a south westerly direction across the sky. i went outside and saw more orange spheres traveling in the same direction but not on the same flightpath. in about a period of 30 minutes i must have seen about 30 orange spheres .(approximately about 1 sphere a minute). they were about 1000 feet high , very bright , traveling about the speed of an propellar aircraft. there was no noise at all coming from the spheres. i look at them through binoculars. i called all my family to view the spheres and my brother took some photos of them. 
they were definately not a firework , chinese lantern , balloon or an aircraft. i and my family have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: 30 orange spheres traveling in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
At about 1:55 am this morning while driving home i saw 5 light in the sky ahead. it was a nearly clear night sky and very cold. the lights were the yellow colour of fire and flickering slightly.  i stopped the car and we got out to watch.  the lights moved steadily over our heads along the line of the flight path to our local airport. there was no noise.  the second light then came to the side of the first light and overtook it. after passing overhead then entered light cloud and one by one faded and disappeared. imediately after a 6th light appeared ahead along the same path and passed over in about 2 minutes.  i got in the car and started up then noticed the seventh again from the same origion and travelling the same direction. we got out again and watched. after moving farely quickly overhead it seemed to virtually stop moving for about an minute then faded and disappeared.  at no point was there any noise even though it was a very quiet night.

there was a little light cloud at from 1500 to 3000 feet and the lights were below at this level.

i am a doctor and ufo sceptic so i don't know what to make of these lights.  we live on the airport flight path and are used to aircraft passing over.  this was different.  the light were far to close for aircraft and should not overtake if they were floating in the wind.  they were travelling the same direction as the clouds but were catching up to them! then seemed to go through the clouds and slowly disappeared.
content.summary: My wife and i witnessed 7 lights travelling in the sky above us.

content.detailedDescription: Well first of all it was new years about 12:27 a.M. . i had just walked my girifriend outside and kissed her . as she was aproaching down stairs, she immediately ran back to me ,she said" babe come outside!So i went outside and she said "baqbe look "! so we b9th loooked we saw a bright red light going really slow. it did'nt have the lights as you wuold see on a air plane. it was going south now we are lococated eubank and lomas. going just asd slow as an air plane. anyways, my girlfriend comes out her apartment as she aproaches my house she see,s another orange bright light going the same direction no noise very silent going the same direction. we wathch it untill it disapeared.
content.summary: Large orange light traveling n to s  speed normal 12:27 another followed

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside for the new years event and in the north sky i saw 3 lazer bright red lights. it is a full moon tonight and the lights were very bright vrs. the moon.  the lights position to me were at 12-3-6 oclock at about a 45 degree from the ground up. the lights were drifting towards the west and moving very-very slowly. the 12 o-clock light started to dim and then dropped from its position in the sky, from 45 deg. to about 20 deg straight down in about 45 secounds time. of watching it. then the light dimmed and went out of view behind houses.  all the while its light emmission was still visible, faint and blinking.  it took about 45 secounds for this event. the 3-6 position lights were still very bright in the sky about 45 deg. from the ground up. the 2 reamaining lights went dim and out about 20 min. from the start of the event.  my first thought was was 3 flares. but 1 of the lights fell from the sky before going dim and the 2 others remained bright and high in the sky drifting towards the west while stll being 45 deg. above the horizon before dimming out of site. my wife took cell phone pitcures.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 lazer red objects in the northern sky. clock position: 12-3 6

content.detailedDescription:
Just before midnight saw 3 solid red lights slowly rise then hold in stationary position in elongated triangle, held in this position for 5 minutes or so then faded....This occurred from apx 11:57 pm right across midnight into the new year. saw one of these lights originate from the same place exactly one year ago at exactly the same time. also saw one of these lights july 4th 2008. the difference this time around was there were 3 in formation. looked through binoculars , just got bigger red lights, no shape other then the triangle position of the lights as described above. further more, got a call from a friend of mine a couple of miles away who was seeing them as well, wanted to make me aware of them. googled event and other people
, many, have seen these lights before, july 4th this year and new years last year{same light i saw} my feeling is these are not extra terrestrial , but then again, likely not simple flares as they were stationary and holding a tight formation...Certainly very strange..Tried to take picture but the limitations of my camera at night photographing distant , relative, small objects leaves a lot to be desired....Did i mention they were dead silent ?
content.summary: 3 solid red lights about brightness of sirius, in tight triangle then wavering, periodic event on holidays !

content.detailedDescription:
i was temporarily staying at a friend's secluded old farmhouse (rented) south of ottawa, ontario (near or just off of hwy 416 well south of manotick, ont.) that night i was there by myself.  from an upstairs bedroom window i watched a number of bright round/ball-like lights making perfect formations, like a perfectly geometrical dance in the sky. they were like large stars that moved very strategically but in various random formations.  

i rubbed my eyes, having difficulty believing what i was seeing.  i ruled out my imagination and even considered the possibility of some extraterrestrial event.  they were almost hypnotic as they joined in formations and burst apart and form other formations.  they moved so perfectly making perfect formations in the sky.  they could dart so unbelievably fast in perfect unisen with one another.  it was hard to believe what i was seeing, which was why i kept looking, turning away and then looking again.  i watched for at least 15 maybe even 30 minutes and was feeling a little afraid which i tried as best i could to supress and ignore.

i stopped looking out the window and layed down on the bed, but kept the lights on.  i was feeling restless, but wanted to go to sleep real bad.   the thoughts i had from "light show" made it real difficult.  i tried shutting my eyes, but was still awake, so my eyes were mostly open.  i was distressed by my inability to sleep.  i soon started to hear a pulsating whoo whoo whoo sound that got closer and closer.  it sounded sort of like a helicopter but not.  as the sound became louder and louder my heart began to pound progressively fast with fear.  the sound got so loud that it felt as though it was hovering right over my head, as if it was suspended right over the roof of the house.  i was fully concious and could see, but my body became totally paralysed.  the paralysis terrified me and my heart beat harder, way harder than i ever thought it could without bursting.  i thought i was going to die from my heart beating so fast and hard. i think i prayed and begged in a think talk way, in fear that my life would end if this continued.  i actually thought i was going to be abducted.  i was still totally paralysed when i heard a voice amidst the loud pulsating whoo whoo whoo sound which was still hovering over the roof of the house that felt directly over my head in the bed that i was laying in.   the (male sounding) voice was as if it spoke like through a mask or through radio waves??  the voice said, "she's not ready yet".  this voice came just as i thought that the hard pounding of my heart was going explode and kill me.  just as the voice spoke, i heard and felt the pulsating whoo whoo whoo sound start fading away within seconds.  i was then able to move my body again.

i think i went downstairs and battled with my fear all the way to day break.  i don't think i spoke about it with anyone for a long time as i thought people would  think i was crazy.  as i became a little older, i spoke about it with very few people ...It was just too weird.  (i am 52 years old now). 

i did not imagine any of this, i know i didn't.

as this was a long time ago, my dates and times are only approximate.  i remember that there was only a small amount of snow on the ground at the time.  the incident occured just weeks before my near fatal car accident (december 2, 1979) of which i was found approx 7 hours later trapped under the passenger side dash inside my totally squished vehicle laying on one of the tires that pushed through the floor of the vehicle.
content.summary: 10 - 20 ? balls of bright coloured lights that could stay motionaless and then burst apart from each other  at u.N.B.E.L.I.E.V.A.B.L.E. speed creating numerous random  geometrical  formations that were perfect in unisen.

content.detailedDescription: We were looking outside our home b/c someone in a fish house 2 miles away was letting off fireworks for new years.  this object flew near the fireworks and over house- perhaps a little over 2 miles.  my mother spotted it, i and my son saw it, we told my father and had to run outside, but he saw only one blink and it disappeared.  there is a blue moon and low lying wispy clouds.  this was no aircraft.  it was a red circle that flashed white.  it was moving in a line...Looked like the fireworks blinking like that, but it was not fireworks.  my mom said, 'well there is an alien ship' like it was no big deal...Seriously, we'll be looking for more tonight.  we made a big joke that it was scared of the 'man of the house' b/c it disappeared when my father went outside and saw the object.
content.summary: Looked like red and white fireworks in a circle- blinking-

content.detailedDescription:
Firstly, this event is described from a friend who witness the event along with his son and 2 of his friends.
he owns a farm in a valley with a river running through it, at the time my friend was sleeping..Trying to sleep off a night of drinking. his son and his friends was cooling off in the stream in the valley. about 1/2 mile away from the farm. when his son awoke him and told him the sun was falling. his estimates the time the sun was falling until the actual landing of the craft was over 3 hours or even longer. so this craft took along time to land. once it landed his son told his dad...Theirs a ufo outside of his house. the father wakes up...Opens the door and sure anough a huge ship lands in the valley. it was so huge...It blocks out the sun and make the surrounding valley dark. the dad looks up and sees windows and ballonies all over this ship. he tells me...It was huge. tiny lights float down from the craft...Another light comes out of the ship and goes into the ground. alot of more stuff happened too...Like they are trapped in the house..While the ufo is right outside. the event takes forever. he even has time to call to his brothers house and tell him what's happening but nobody believes him. 
he is scared...Along with his kids. the craft stay on the ground for over 8 hours...He tells me it took the craft afew hours to land and it seems like they drilled a hole into the ground too.

the next day...The government quarantined the whole area with danger tape saying it's a h2s leak...Along with news of a torando landing. i myself heard this new about the tornado...Just north of edmonton. he always tried to get someone to listen to his story but nobody believes him. i do..Will pass on his information and contact phone number if you guys contact me. he has a greater account of the whole exprience...

jp
content.summary: Massive ship lands on farm

content.detailedDescription: Myself my girlfreind and my 10 year old son have been walking home from my parents house we are all sober mygirlfreind is 5 months pregnent i had 4 beers as we walked my girlfreind seen an orange light in the clouds and we looked it moved very fast across then seem to slow down but it was getting smaller in size and we realized that it was actually moving away from us until it disapeared, earlier in the night my parents seen the light and shouted us to come and have a look but we thought it was just a aeroplane but what we all seen was definetly not an aeroplane it was something i have never seen before.
content.summary: Oronge still light stayed still then moved fast away in to orbit

content.detailedDescription: Just a flash on video
content.summary: Just a flash on video

content.detailedDescription:
3 lights came at a 90 degree angle to the usual flightpath of planes from here ( we are under the heathrow flightpath), they were flying at about the same speed as planes usually do here, but had the colour of candles. i assumed they were chinese laterns, but then one suddenly changed direction by 90 degrees to cross one of the others, then turned 180 degrees to cross the other. then all flew towards london and disappeared (may have been covered by clouds). they were too close together to be planes and there were no red/green lights, just orange. there was no noise, so they were not a helicopter and as only one changed direction and quite suddenly they were unlikely to be chinese laterns. 

i was in the garden at the time to have a cigarette
i noticed them mainly because they came from a different direction than planes do round here and because they were so close together and in a straight line. 
i first thought they were hot air balloons / chinese laterns
i had no specific feeling, apart from suprise. 
i lost sight when they disappeared, either under clouds or just vanished. (we have broken low clouds tonight)
content.summary: 3 round lights, looking like a candle flying in a line, then one changed direction to cross the others twice

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my house at around 8:30 am to smoke a cigarette. i was standing in my front driveway leaning on the back of my car and i leaned my head back to enjoy the morning sky when i saw a silver circular object going through the sky pretty fast. i first thought it would have had to be a helicopter based on the shape. i don't know heights that well but it would've been closer to a airplanes height in the sky then a helicopter. i looked at it for about 10 seconds and specifically looked for wings because i was like there is no way i'm seeing a real ufo right now, but i couldn't see wings on it and i couldn't see the rotors or a tail. it appeared to be spherical from the angle i was seeing it at. it was a shiny silver chrome color. it maintained a straight flight path. i was very surprised by it and pretty uneasy just for the fact that it was there. i know a lot about ufo's but i was still very surprised to see one. i quickly ran inside and showed my brother from his upstairs balcony but by now it was almost a dot and he saw it but couldn't make out any details.
content.summary: Silver circular object higher than a helicopter heading towards mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at the eastern edge of francestown, nh in a westerly direction on dec. 12, 2009 and observed at approximately 6:05 pm a green spherical object descend at some distance away toward the earth's surface. it was dark out with high overcast, but the visibility was very clear to the cloud cover. the object was observed for about 3-5 seconds. i observed it travel from the top of the passenger-side front windshield to the left on a downward trajectory following a straight line toward the earth's surface at approximately a 30 degree angle. this suggested a generally northerly to a southerly direction of travel. it took the stated short amount of time for it to go behind the tree line. my windows were rolled up during the sighting. there was no sound during its flight and no sound of any crash. nothing was reported on the news about any airplane crash that night or the following day. there is no airport in this general direction. the object appeared perfectly spherical and about the size of a green pea to a chick pea held at arms length. it was not possible to determine the size of the object or the distance to the object, since i had no points of reference. however, it was clearly below and in front of the cloud cover. the object was a luminous green colored sphere with the edges sharply delineated. the object's center appeared slightly less luminous and less green looking. it traveled faster than would an airplane and at a far steeper angle than would an airplane heading toward a landing on the ground. on this same road i have observed many airplanes, usually from my direct left, approaching manchester airport (east of me by 15 miles and behind my direction of travel). this object was totally different than the multiple lights of commercial airplanes. it appeared significantly larger, moved faster and dove steeper than any aircraft. it also looked nothing like a meteor, which can have a greenish color. the meteors i have observed tend to have a 'streaky' appearance as they leave behind a trail of debris and high energy gas and are not perfectly spherical, as this object definitely was. in decades of watching the sky i have never before observed an object i could not identify as an airplane or helicopter or some natural phenomenon. this object definitely fits the unidentified category. it was unlike any kind of aircraft or natural phenomenon i have ever observed.
content.summary: Observed green sphere descend at 30 degree downward angle toward earth

content.detailedDescription:
At that time i was unfamiliar with a new intersection due to road construction on hwy 39. not knowing  where  it  would intersect with 22  i was traveling  slower, thinking i would  intersect this  truck in a  few minutes in this unknown intersection! so we were  watching closely because  of it being dusk and  oncoming  traffic and not sure  of  where  we would meet.  
except it became apparent it was not on a road and it was not a truck! the picture i saw that  drew  me  to this  site  was  very much  similar to what we saw but, the lights that run across the mid-section in the  picture had only one  or 2 areas being lit.  what we saw had all the  double row of windows? fully lit. you  could see inside the craft but no activity was seen inside thru the windows unfortunately (we felt  they  were   window panes of  some  sort because  we could distinguish depth ~ looking into  some type  of  vehicle...As it passed directly in front of  us. no  sound, no  wings, and  motating at about 35 to 50 mph not  like  it  was  in  a  landing  mode  but  in an even flight path (it was not  a  hot air balloon!) we  never took  our  eyes off  of  it  from  the  minute  we  saw  it  and  watched  it   about 15-17 minutes totally..Originally  from  when  we  thought  it  was  a  semi-truck! it was  only flying up to 40' above the  ground if  that! so  in  the  valley  it  appeared  to  be  on  a  road...I have  always  been  looking  at  the  ufo pics  and  only  seen  one  or  2  things  that  came  close to it! we  knew  there  were  2  cars  behind  us  and  3  oncoming  and noone mentioned  it  to  media whatso ever  including  our selves!   but i was glad  there  was  2  of us in  my  car  so  i can  attest we were  not hallucinating! we  found  our  turn  off  shortly taking  a  spur  they  had  at  that  time  to connect  to  39  and  travel to albion... we  could  see  it  for  a  short while  glimpsing  it  only  one  other  time   due  to  the  road  dipping  down into  valleys...It  continued on  in  a  northeasterly fashion...I  would  be  nice  to  know  what  it  was! since  we  saw  it  so  up close  and  personal...It  remains  a  mystery  to  us after all of  this  time! http://www.Coasttocoastam.Com/photo/42966
content.summary: We  were  traveling  west  on hwy 22 shortly after  sunset noticed what we thought a well lighted semi traveling the river valley in a northeasterly direction.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 7:40 pm cdt, i drove to a corner store, about one mile from my house, for a package of little cigars and a coke to see what remained of our first ���white christmas��� in 83 years (before i was born!).

as i returned to my car from inside the store where i had visited with the owner for a few minutes or so, something caught my eye low in the due northern sky: a yellowish/white broad light that was not shining at me, or out in front of the object, but was ���glowing��� downwards, but not casting a ���beam��� of light! i thought, how strange, but then the brisk cold air got to me so i hurried on home to see if i could get a better look at this, thing.

less than five minutes later, or, about 7:46 to 7:48 pm cdt, i parked my car at home and walked to my porch and looked up to the lower southern sky and saw this huge rear end of what could not have been an airplane, as it was only a few hundred feet off the ground, and the rear lights were perfectly huge!

there were four of them, two yellowish/white and two reddish/white, perfectly circular, spaced one after the other (white, red, white, red) in a roll in shape with a red blinking light in the middle or, possibly in the bottom area, when i thought it was likely an airplane, but i heard no sound whatsoever.

what i was looking at, that was gliding so slowly that if it had of been some known aircraft; it would have fallen from the sky, seemed to me to be the rear end of a triangle-shaped ufo i have seen graphics of and some videos of from eyewitnesses.

these lights were not bright, did not give off a ���brightness glow��� nor were they hard to look at, yet they were soft in their illumination. 

the huge object was almost hovering as it was gliding so slowly. i watched it moving towards the due south, and i know where the due south is from my front yard, having a compass watch that i calculate with every season, plus i know my star charts, being a former navy seal and navigator.

these four lights were perfectly round and did not blink at all: only the small red light blinked in an odd manner unlike the belly lights found on traditional aircraft that blink in a continuous series as a warning. i know this from having once worked for delta airlines as a fuel service agent. this little red light would blink real fast, and then stop, and then blink real fast a few seconds later, and stop.

i was very awed, despite my past in witnessing and videotaping such oddities we call ufos, standing out in the 30f odd degree cold night air, as i truly believed that i was seeing the rear end of a triangle shaped ufo gliding southwards, ever so slowly.

the area where the large lights were located was a perfectly boxed-in area, or squared off with the lights within.

now, i had my camcorder just inside my house on the coffee table, as i had been taking footage of the very rare snow that we had gotten yesterday afternoon, 12/24/2009, for the first time since 1926, as the tv news had related. 

when my camcorder came to mind, the object had traveled farther away to the due south, although i thought i could get some footage of it. 

i decided to watch it instead, as if i had of gotten footage by that time of watching it for about four minutes, it would have been seen as simply colored lights that i described above in the cold night air, becoming smaller as it traveled slowly away. i remained very solemn and almost depressed, but soon made notes of the times and placements and contacted the county police and after seven (7) phone numbers; the faa was finally contacted and mailed off a requested report with the drawing. i was promised that radar of the area, day and times, would be checked and i would be notified of the results. i have not contacted the major media until all other possibilities have been ruled out.

conclusion: this object was too huge and flying too low and silently to have been any known, earthly aircraft! because of the placement of the huge circular lights to the rear of the object; rule out any earthly aircraft. 

these were not ���fixed winged lights��� that shine out in front of airplanes, as this object was heading away from me to the south, plus the fact of its slow rate of speed and freezing night air; rule out a horizontal hot air balloon of any type based upon little to no wind and the object was moving in such a fixed position that it did not vary even slightly!

i affirm that the above is true and correct as i have described.
respectfully,

jason leigh
http://jasonleigh.Org
content.summary: Huge ufo seen from the rear on christmas night, 12/25/2009!

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from a friends house about 11pm, it was a very clear night and there was also very little light polution. i looked up.. i noticed the sky was full of stars and admired the clear night for a few moments. i noticed one paticular bright looking star and focused on it for a few moments when it suddenly shot across the sky from one point to another, stopped for a short moment maybe 10 seconds then again suddenly moved to another point in the sky, stopped again then maybe 5 seconds later shot off and dissapered off into space in a blink of an eye. 
the object was extremly high in the sky if not already in space given that it looked very similar to the other stars. if this really was the case then it must have moved hundreds of miles in each movement...
content.summary: Star like object very high in the sky stop start movement at lightning speed before moving off into space

content.detailedDescription:
My 2 kids & i were driving home after picking up some batteries at the dollar general store at 5497 airline drive in bossier city, louisiana. the receipt says i checked out at 6:43pm, so it probably took about 10 minutes to get to the area where we all 3 saw the object. in order to get home, we drive north on airline, turn right (east) onto "linton", then right again onto "parks". this road, "parks", is very winding & runs along the edge of a bayou/large man-made lake, "cypress lake/black bayou". we had just gone over the very small bridge on "parks" that goes over the water there (you can see this all in detail on mapquest using 5497 airline- zip 71111" "as the start & "220 running deer lane -zip 71006" as the end, although the road doesn't look near as winding on the arial view because it doesn't show the road blocks that are up now, etc.) at which point the road makes a very sharp turn & is flanked by a tall levy on the left (north) side & a swamp area on the other. in the distance ahead, above the levy, we could see a very bright "star" off to the left side of the horizon above the trees. it was very cloudy, with no other stars visible, i noticed. it was very still. i saw it, but said nothing, as my hubby is always on the lookout for ufo's & i do believe they exist, but unlike him, i don't like talking about it with the kids so much, as i think it might be a bit confusing to them. so, i just looked & said nothing, but then my 8-year-old son says, "hey mom, look at that star over there; isn't it weird?" 
 
i said it was pretty bright, at which he asked if i thought it was the north star. i told him i didn't think that it was a star, really. too big & bright. maybe it's a light on the top of an oil derrick or a really tall crane. (i'd never seen either there before, but there's been quite a bit of construction right in that very area were now driving through.) "an oil derrick, that high???", he answered, skeptically. "i bet it's a ufo."

"oh, god. now his dad's got him all into that stuff too", i thought. "well, i don't know about that for sure. we'll see in a minute when we get up here."
 
ok. so all that transpired in about 30 seconds time, maybe, & the bright light was now directly ahead of us, i'd assumed it looked like that because of the sharp curving of the road, not because the light itself moving. it was so smooth & slow & level, it seemed. i was trying to not think of this as a weird situation with my kids! in fact, by now i was so dumbfounded that i only put together certain details that didn't add up to its being anything but a ufo/government craft until after it was over & i had time to think about it. because of the heavy road construction & short detour, the trees blocked it from our view as we passed the dam (clearly visible on the arial-view map) but i could see it as we rounded the bend & it was bright as ever & now on our right side & still up ahead, but it appeared to be much closer at this point, which was about 3600 feet from where we first saw it at the bend in the road. we kept traveling up the road at the same speed of about 45 mph for another 2000 feet or so, & the thing was still there as big & bright as  up in the night sky right ahead of us. so we are all just saying,"oh my god!!! look! do you see that?!", to each other, even though, of course, we all do. as i turn around the last very sharp turn on this road, it comes to a stretch of road that is very straight for about 1400 feet before ending in a "t" at "crouch rd,". (on the arial map, this will appear as a right-angle  some distance after the dam, which then makes another very sharp, almost-right-angle immediately after the first. it was this second turn after which we saw the ufo very closely) right when i made the turn, it was just there plain as day, about 4 stories(?) above the ground, very low. i saw the triangular shape & the flickering lights on the back & said aloud to myself, "oh, that's just something from barksdale", as it looked rather like one of those pointy stealth planes. but then i thought, wait- it's not making any sound & it's not moving either! to say that i was tripping out would be an understatement. i neglected to mention that there was another vehicle, i think it was a truck, behind me riding my bumper this whole time, & so as i thought of stopping for a closer look, i also was afraid they'd rear-end me. i knew there was a road coming up on the left, "cypress village", that never has any traffic on it, so i planned to do a u-turn & then stop to get a better view.

it was all happening so fast! as i approached that road, we were almost under it & we could see the huge dark shape of it above with 3 round, bright lights in the middle in a triangle pattern, & with 4 smaller red & white lights in a row along the back end which were lighting up in a certain rapid sequence over & over. i can't recall if they lit up clockwise or counter-clockwise....At the very end before i turned, i had to lean completely up over the steering wheel & look straight up through the windshield to still see it. it was jaw-dropping, scary, yet amazing. i did the fastest u-ee ever on that street & by the time i had done the 180, it was far up into the sky appearing as a plane flying over might look. it was also going back in the direction we'd just come from rather quickly. i grabbed my phone & called my hub, as this would've been his ultimate dream to have experienced, & told him we were now following the craft back in the other direction. we stayed on the phone for the short time that we could still see it, way up ahead, & by the time we rounded the blind-spot detour this second, speedier time, it had vanished.  it was amazing that the phone worked, because that whole area, from that very first curve by the bridge all the way to some good distance up "crouch" is usually a dead zone, although there has been a couple of other times where it didn't drop my call. i was glad he got to hear what was happening at least. my son said afterward that he was shaking from fright, & my 5-year-old daughter isn't afraid of anything, so it was really just an adventure to her. :) i was quite shaken & feel as if i must be crazy, although i know & my kids know what we each saw that night. i sat in the car talking to my friend, whom i called right after it was over, & my son went inside the house, & unbeknownst to me, started drawing a pic to show dad what it looked like. (he's actually  rather good artist for his age too!) after i came in a few minutes later, i took dad into the back of the house to tell him all about it, & drew a very simple sketch showing the basic shape & position of the lights on it. shortly after that, my son came in & held up his much-better version of the same thing i'd drawn only minutes before. at this point, i'm still a bit confused about why it did that, & only wonder where it came from - space, or from the nearby barksdale afb. and who was in that truck behind me & where did they go? i didn't notice in the middle of my freakout....I'd like to find them & talk about it; surely they saw it too. also, i'd like to mention that we saw another mysterious light in the sky back in the summer this year. it was in south shreveport, on a piece of property owned by my boss on wallace lake rd. as i said, dear hub's always keeping an eye out, & i've gotten called away from doing dishes or other tasks to check out things that turn out to be planes, satellites, etc. on many occasions in the past. but this night, as we were out stargazing, we saw a bright light in the sky verrrryyyy far away amongst the stars which stopped & started a few times & then just shrank inward from a big bright halo of light to absolutely within maybe a minute's time. very odd, but this recent event tops it all!!! i'll try to send a copy of the sketches soon!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular ufo flying over lake & countryside in the early evening in nwlouisiana

content.detailedDescription: When i notice the object in the sky it looked like a sun symbol but it flight and hovering.  and then by day break it was gone found the fuel by the highway in the morning.
content.summary: The ufo looked like a sun symbol.

content.detailedDescription:
I think the wierdest part of this experience is the moment before noticing the objects which came west-to-east from california. all the stars in the sky started doing small cirles rotating back and forth like the sky was shaking. 

the objects appeared green from lake havasu city, arizona looking back at lake havasu california. the objects appeared to gain altitude, momentarily conjoin together, and then break apart again flying parallel of each other and directly over the lake and the edge of the northern part of lake havasu city. 

it was a friday night, so we could not have been the only three people to observe them in the night sky. the entire sighting lasted anywhere from 10-30 minutes. 

the objects were turtle shell shaped and had a green florescent glow about them on approach from california to arizona. they were identical in markings, lights, shape, and large as 3 or 4 747's with no sound coming from them. they both had three rows of three rectangular color-changing lights underneath. in the back was one rectangular white blinking light. 

the objects had what appeared to be rear exhaust systems, like i said, much similar to looking at a closed turtle shell. the objects were dark in color themselves, with a crude hard outer layer. 

no photographs of the incident were taken because we were all juveniles and not supposed to be out at that time of night unsupervised. we all had strange sensations of being watched at the time, and we all believed we experienced missing time, how much was never determined. 

both objects continued flying parallel towards the east towards phoenix until out of sight. i have posted this sighting in here before and do not know why i am having to post it again, but have no problem doing so. i have kept contact with one of my friends from that night in lake havasu and he always tells me he has never seen anything like it again, and often forgets that it happened until he hears from me via telephone. 

myself, since moving back to alaska, i have had countless sightings, some on film and some on video......I will be donating more film and video to mufon soon.
content.summary: Very large turtle shell shaped objects at a low altitude flying silent and parallel of each other.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at my computer looking at live cameras in various cities.  i went to earthcam.Com and look at our nations capital.  there was a link to a u.S. park service camera that had a view from the netherlands carillon looking east.  visual range, according to the camera, is approximately 88 miles.

i copied the picture it took to my desktop and when it updated a couple minutes later, the "effect" was gone.  i am attaching the photo that the nps camera took as i saw it.  no tampering has been done to the attached photo.
content.summary: Checking washington, d.C. national park service cam.
